item.title: The Dubai Chamber has announced the launch of the Dubai Smartpreneur Competition for 2017
item.description:
The Dubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry, working with the Smart Dubai Office, launched the second annual Dubai Smartpreneur Competition. This aligns with the vision of His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, UAE Vice President and Prime Minister, and Ruler of Dubai, to make Dubai a leading smart city. Source: Dubai Chamber. The event featured a panel discussion about the UAE government’s progress on smart city and innovation initiatives, and what will drive future sustainable growth...

item.title: Entrepreneurs in South Malaysia are receiving support from BAHTERA
item.description:
The Malaysian Ministry of Finance (MoF) has revealed that the upcoming BAHTERA series will be held on October 14th and 15th at the PERSADA Convention Centre in Johor Bahru. BAHTERA aligns with the Malaysian government’s 11th Malaysia Plan to strengthen the Bumiputera economy. The event aims to equip Bumiputera entrepreneurs with valuable business insights, effective branding techniques, and relevant technology. This year, BAHTERA anticipates over 6,000 attendees. Themed Bumipreneurs of Tomorrow, BAHTERA (Southern Edition) is tailored for entrepreneurs and Bumiputera businesses in Southern Malaysia...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/entrepreneurs-in-south-malaysia-are-receiving-support-from-bahtera/

item.title: Success in business relies on establishing a broad network, having a strong passion, dedicating time, and learning from numerous failures
item.description:
Alex Foo, co-founder of the entrepreneur-focused psychometric profiling tool Starteur, offers three key tips for entrepreneurial success. These insights, derived from both his attendance at the Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2016 (June 22-24, USA) and his personal journey as a young entrepreneur, were shared during a Shopee University session. Foo’s trip to GES 2016 was sponsored by Shopee, the e-commerce platform by Garena. This sponsorship reflects Shopee’s commitment to nurturing the next generation of Singaporean entrepreneurs...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/success-in-business-relies-on-establishing-a-broad-network-having-a-strong-passion-dedicating-time-and-learning-from-numerous-failures/

item.title: New focus on Kickstarter: A mouse glove as a replacement for traditional computer mice
item.description:
A new Kickstarter project called the “Mouse Glove” aims to revolutionize how we interact with technology, potentially replacing touch screens entirely. Source: Kickstarter website The creators of the Mouse Glove claim their invention offers a more ergonomic and intuitive user experience compared to traditional mice. By promoting a more natural hand position, they believe it can reduce the risk of repetitive strain injuries like carpal tunnel syndrome. The glove replicates standard mouse functionalities, including left and right clicks, scrolling, and cursor control...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/new-focus-on-kickstarter-a-mouse-glove-as-a-replacement-for-traditional-computer-mice/

item.title: Bank Mandiri is seeking submissions for the Young Entrepreneur award 2015
item.description:
Bank Mandiri, a prominent bank in Indonesia, launched its yearly competition called Mandiri Young Entrepreneur (WMM) in 2015. Kartika Wirjoatmodjo, the Director of Finance & Strategy at Bank Mandiri, stated that this competition aims to discover young individuals with entrepreneurial potential who can contribute to Indonesia’s growth. Kartika added that the competition also intends to inspire a passion for entrepreneurship and innovation among students and graduates, encouraging more young entrepreneurs to emerge...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bank-mandiri-is-seeking-submissions-for-the-young-entrepreneur-award-2015/

item.title: Kickstarter spotlight: TwistVolt, the innovative power strip designer
item.description:
While typical power strips only accommodate standard plugs, the TwistVolt sets itself apart. It features built-in USB outlets and a flexible design that allows for twisting and folding to better suit your power needs. Source: Kickstarter website Michael Schroeder, the inventor, explains that their goal was to create a new kind of power strip that prioritizes energy efficiency and provides easy access to all outlets. The result is a product with exceptional energy efficiency, ample USB charging capacity, and a distinctive, patent-pending design that eliminates outlet blockage...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/kickstarter-spotlight-twistvolt-the-innovative-power-strip-designer/

item.title: Golden Equator Consulting assists small and medium-sized enterprises and startups in advancing towards success
item.description:
Golden Equator Consulting (GE Consulting), a business consultancy firm, has established a presence in Singapore to serve small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) and startups in the region. Sharon Chong, CEO of GE Consulting, noted that these businesses need strategic and operational support to streamline their growth and focus on core business functions. GE Consulting offers comprehensive business consultancy services, covering areas such as business strategy, sales positioning, financial support, marketing, technology, human resources, and legal compliance...

item.title: Global marketing summit for Malaysian entrepreneurs hosted by INSKEN
item.description:
Source: INSKEN. Firdaus delivered welcome remarks at GMS 2018. Now in its second year, the Institut Keusahawanan Negara’s (INSKEN) annual Global Marketing Summit (GMS) seeks to cultivate innovative leaders within the Malaysian entrepreneurial landscape. Malaysian Minister Datuk Seri Mohd Redzuan Yusof highlighted the ongoing emphasis on fostering the expansion of entrepreneurs and small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), particularly those in the B40 and M40 income brackets. He stated that the Ministry of Entrepreneur Development (MED) will leverage allocated funds to execute a targeted and comprehensive entrepreneur development strategy in 2019...

item.title: The Australian government, in collaboration with Microsoft and MassChallenge, aims to enhance the local startup ecosystem
item.description:
The Australian government is investing A$280,000 to bring MassChallenge, a leading global startup accelerator, to Australia. The goal is to support the growth of local startups. MassChallenge, in partnership with Microsoft Australia and the Australian government, will offer resources such as idea-pitching competitions, boot camps, and mentoring to strengthen the Australian startup ecosystem. As a non-profit, equity-free accelerator, MassChallenge provides promising startups with the opportunity to compete for millions of dollars in cash awards...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-australian-government-in-collaboration-with-microsoft-and-masschallenge-aims-to-enhance-the-local-startup-ecosystem/

item.title: Some businesses are finding success with crowdfunding
item.description:
Crowdfunding, particularly through platforms like Kickstarter, has proven very successful for certain entrepreneurs. The typical project presents a concept and images of the product in development and seeks funding from backers. Both entrepreneurs and their backers can be located anywhere globally. Funding is usually sought through tiered pledges, where higher pledges receive products with additional features. This process is often gamified with “stretch goals,” where exceeding funding targets unlocks new rewards for all backers at specific milestones...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/some-businesses-are-finding-success-with-crowdfunding/

item.title: The first Founders' Friday session in Singapore by Huawei will showcase Scott Bales
item.description:
Source: Scott Bales website. Huawei is launching a new networking series called Founders’ Friday. The series aims to connect business leaders with professionals to exchange ideas, address difficulties, and develop innovative solutions for advancing the digital world. The inaugural event, presented alongside the HUAWEI Mate 9, features prominent digital and innovation expert Scott Bales. He will discuss essential principles for fostering a culture of innovation within organizations. Bales, the Managing Director of Singapore-based Innovation Labs Asia, brings over a decade of global experience in innovation, thought leadership, implementation planning, and strategy...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-first-founders-friday-session-in-singapore-by-huawei-will-showcase-scott-bales/

item.title: Kickstarter spotlight: An innovative USB cable that charges smartphones at double the speed
item.description:
Minsoo and Emily Seo have developed a USB charging cable, DouBBleTime, that significantly reduces charging times for iPhones and Samsung Galaxy phones compared to standard cables. As explained on their Kickstarter page, typical USB cables attempt to communicate with the connected device while delivering limited power. In contrast, the DouBBleTime cable features a switch that prioritizes charging, effectively decreasing charging time. Source: Kickstarter. The Seos state on their Kickstarter page that a unique chip within the switch communicates with the connected computer, signaling that it only requires charging energy and not data syncing...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/kickstarter-spotlight-an-innovative-usb-cable-that-charges-smartphones-at-double-the-speed/

item.title: The Women in Business Asia Pageant hosts a workshop on digital marketing
item.description:
Source: Women in Business Asia Pageant Facebook page. To empower women entrepreneurs, the Women in Business Asia Pageant is holding a masterclass on digital marketing and social media strategies specifically for women in Singapore. The session, titled “Digital Marketing and Social Media Hacks for Women in Business,” will run for one hour and teach participants how to build an effective, business-oriented website designed to generate leads. Attendees will discover how to incorporate both original and curated content into their marketing plans...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-women-in-business-asia-pageant-hosts-a-workshop-on-digital-marketing/

item.title: IdeaLab gives power to startups in ASEAN
item.description:
IdeaLab 2016, a focused two-day startup conference, will highlight ASEAN startup collaboration and the Malaysian startup scene. It also features the Malaysian Business Angels Network (MBAN) Summit, attracting investors globally. The organizers aim to bring together 500 top startups, investors, and corporations from the ASEAN ecosystem. Attendees can participate in various stages. The Ideation Stage features industry leaders discussing critical issues faced by startups in ASEAN. At the IdeaPad Stage, the best ASEAN startups compete before a panel of judges...

item.title: The winners of Ascendas-Singbridge Her Startup 2016 in Singapore have been announced
item.description:
Source: The Ascendas-Singbridge Group. From left: Ho Kheng Lian, Venture Partner, Vectr Ventures; Natalie Loh, Vice President of Products, Vanitee; Kuik Xiao Shi, Co-Founder, Vanitee; Pocket Sun, Founding Partner of SoGal Ventures; Adrianna Tan, Founder, Wobe; Virginia Tan, Co-founder and Managing Director of Lean In China; Adeline Quek, Head of Regional Business Development, Grabtaxi; Mrs Nina Yang, Chief Operating Officer of Singbridge. item.title: UOB discovers misunderstandings about financing options for small and medium businesses in Singapore
item.description:
Source: UOB infographic. Statistics gathered from the Financing for Startups and Small Businesses Survey. A recent study by United Overseas Bank (UOB) revealed that a significant number of startups and small businesses in Singapore lack a comprehensive understanding of the alternative funding options available to them for early expansion. These businesses are also uncertain about how to effectively utilize options such as venture capital, venture debt, and debt and equity crowdfunding...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/uob-discovers-misunderstandings-about-financing-options-for-small-and-medium-businesses-in-singapore/

item.title: Asian venture capital investments have remained stable in the fourth quarter of 2016
item.description:
Venture capital (VC) investment experienced a global decline in 2016, following a strong 2015, according to the Venture Pulse Q4 2016 report by KPMG Enterprise. Global VC investment decreased by 24% year-over-year, totaling US$127.4 billion. Despite a promising start to the year, investor confidence waned in the latter half of 2016 due to uncertainties in the market. Events like Brexit and the US presidential election furthered this uncertainty. Chia Tek Yew, Head of Financial Services Advisory at KPMG in Singapore, noted that this period of uncertainty allowed VCs to refine their portfolios, focus on high-potential deals, and guide their portfolio companies towards further growth...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/asian-venture-capital-investments-have-remained-stable-in-the-fourth-quarter-of-2016/

item.title: Collective Works and CapitaLand are teaming up to launch a new coworking space
item.description:
Artist’s impression of the new coworking space at Capital Tower, Singapore. A new high-end coworking space will be launched on the 12th floor of Singapore’s Capital Tower. This joint venture between two companies will occupy 22,000 square feet and support 250 businesses. The space is adaptable and caters to a variety of businesses, from new startups to large corporations. Technological features include secure server hosting, video conferencing, internet phone services, and fiber optic broadband internet...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/collective-works-and-capitaland-are-teaming-up-to-launch-a-new-coworking-space/

item.title: A new tech and innovation business club has been introduced in Singapore
item.description:
SPECTRUM, a curated tech and innovation business club, has been established in Singapore. The organization, co-founded by Cheryl Lee and Shirley Crystal Chua, aims to create a globally connected ecosystem for businesses seeking to expand into Asia by providing expert advice, necessary resources, and strategic networks. SPECTRUM has partnered with Golden Equator and Mistletoe to form a collaborative network of seven strategic groups: innovators, learning institutions, executors, backers, enablers, government agencies, and ecosystem builders and partners...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/a-new-tech-and-innovation-business-club-has-been-introduced-in-singapore/

item.title: Entrepreneurs may find synergy in collaborating with larger corporations
item.description:
Large corporations are missing out on a $1.5 trillion global growth opportunity by not collaborating with entrepreneurs on digital innovation, reveals a new study by Accenture. This missed opportunity, representing 2.2% of global GDP, exists despite the fact that businesses of all sizes recognize the need for digital transformation. The report, “Harnessing the Power of Entrepreneurs to Open Innovation,” surveyed over 1,000 entrepreneurs and 1,000 large companies across G20 nations. Findings indicate that 82% of corporations acknowledge the learning potential startups offer in digital business transformation...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/entrepreneurs-may-find-synergy-in-collaborating-with-larger-corporations/

item.title: Focus of Kickstarter campaign: Sitting cross-legged on a CrossChair
item.description:
Dave McClintock designed a chair that lets you comfortably rest with your legs up. Its unique design is so flexible, it even allows for the sukhasana yoga pose while seated. McClintock explained that the chair caters to millions of workers who experience fatigue, back pain, and stiff muscles from prolonged sitting. While crossing your legs can alleviate these issues, traditional office chairs lack the ergonomics. The CrossChair solves this by enabling various sitting positions, including cross-legged, promoting movement and reducing discomfort...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/focus-of-kickstarter-campaign-sitting-cross-legged-on-a-crosschair/

item.title: Kickstarter's main focus is on recording directly from your phone to the computer
item.description:
Recap S2, a compact device designed to connect to smartphones for saving calls to external devices like computers or voice recorders, is seeking funding on Kickstarter. Source: Kickstarter website Inventor Igor Ramos highlights the device’s user-friendliness, stating its compatibility with any device equipped with a combo port for input and a standard stereo microphone port for output. Ramos assures users that Recap recordings maintain the original call quality. A video demonstration is available here...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/kickstarter-s-main-focus-is-on-recording-directly-from-your-phone-to-the-computer/

item.title: Shopee Malaysia honors female entrepreneurs
item.description:
Shopee, a leading mobile marketplace in Southeast Asia and Taiwan, marked International Women’s Day on March 8, 2017, by recognizing the achievements of women. This year’s International Women’s Day centers around empowering women globally and inspiring them to make bold moves. Shopee Malaysia honored this theme by highlighting the stories of women entrepreneurs who took a leap of faith to launch their own ventures. The platform’s user-friendly design, free nationwide shipping, and zero-commission fees are designed to encourage more women to tap into their potential as leaders and business owners...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/shopee-malaysia-honors-female-entrepreneurs/

item.title: Kickstarter spotlight: An improved chair designed to alleviate back discomfort
item.description:
Simon Hong, a neuroscientist, is seeking funding for his invention, the Chairbot. This robotic chair aims to eliminate back pain by suggesting new positions to the user based on their current posture. Source: Kickstarter page The Chairbot’s unique design features a split seat that encourages users to alternate between sitting and standing, reducing strain on the spine. Hong explains on the Kickstarter page that this constant shifting prevents the spinal trauma associated with maintaining a single posture for long periods...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/kickstarter-spotlight-an-improved-chair-designed-to-alleviate-back-discomfort/

item.title: Singapore is ranked third in the Asia-Pacific region for promoting the growth of women entrepreneurs
item.description:
Source: Dell. Post-it notes show challenges facing women in the workplace. • Out of the top cities in the Asia Pacific region, Singapore ranks third behind Sydney and Melbourne, Australia, in Dell’s yearly Women Entrepreneur Cities (WE Cities) Index, which analyzes cities’ ability to support women entrepreneurs. • Since 2017, all 50 cities included in the study have demonstrated year-over-year progress in the majority of the evaluated areas. Cities in the Asia Pacific region are keeping pace with global improvements, demonstrating the most significant growth in the Talent area...

item.title: EY introduces the Entrepreneur of the Year 2016 award in Saudi Arabia
item.description:
For the third consecutive year, EY has announced the launch of the Entrepreneur Of The Year (EOY) 2016 award in Saudi Arabia. This year, the EOY will center on medium-sized enterprises, emphasizing their successes and the significance of their expansion and prosperity. The event has been conducted internationally for 29 years in 150 cities across 60 countries. Ahmed I. Reda, Office Managing Partner at EY, Jeddah, and Entrepreneur Of The Year Leader at EY, states, “As we celebrate the 30th anniversary of the EOY program globally, we are excited to host the Saudi Arabia EOY program again this year...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ey-introduces-the-entrepreneur-of-the-year-2016-award-in-saudi-arabia/

item.title: Within the next five years, one-third of young Arabs intend to launch their own businesses
item.description:
According to the 2016 ASDA’A Burson-Marsteller Arab Youth Survey, over one-third of young Arabs plan to launch their own businesses within the next five years. The survey indicates that young Arabs believe governments could do more to support them, such as promoting affordable lending, enhancing training and education opportunities, and reducing bureaucratic hurdles. When asked if their generation is more likely to start businesses than previous ones, 54% agreed. GCC youth were the most optimistic at 62%, compared to 54% in North Africa and 44% in the Levant...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/within-the-next-five-years-one-third-of-young-arabs-intend-to-launch-their-own-businesses/

item.title: The Pi1M Training Programme offered by Digi provides benefits to small business owners
item.description:
Source: Digi. Participants of the Pi1M Training Programme gathered for a group photo. Digi Telecommunications recently conducted a training program for community members residing near the company-managed Pusat Internet 1 Malaysia (Pi1M) centers. This tailored program reflects Digi’s commitment to fostering online entrepreneurship within its Pi1M communities. Currently, Digi manages 34 Pi1Ms across Pahang, Kelantan, Terengganu, Johor, Melaka, and Sarawak, with plans to establish 70 more centers by year’s end...

item.title: Business Intelligence Information System for sharing insights on businesses in Dubai
item.description:
The Dubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry recently introduced the Business Intelligence Information System (BIIS), a new digital platform designed to revolutionize how business information is accessed and utilized. This initiative aligns with the UAE Vice President and Prime Minister, and Ruler of Dubai, HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum’s vision of transforming Dubai into a smart city. BIIS provides a centralized hub for users to obtain crucial information about local and international businesses, empowering companies to identify potential partners and make well-informed decisions...

item.title: HubSpot for Startups simplifies the onboarding process for new businesses
item.description:
HubSpot, a company that provides marketing and sales technology, has launched a new program called HubSpot for Startups. This program is specifically designed to support startups that are working with accelerators, incubators, and entrepreneurial organizations. The program aims to help these small businesses gain momentum in their marketing and sales efforts by offering a substantial 90% discount on HubSpot’s products. These products include tools for customer relationship management (CRM), sales, and marketing...

item.description:
Source: Dell SlideShare. Cover slide for the deck introducing the Dell 2018 Women Entrepreneur Cities Study. At the 9th annual Dell Women Entrepreneur Network Summit (DWEN) in Toronto, Canada, Dell introduced new analytical resources for local governments and policymakers. These tools are intended to support the success of female entrepreneurs. item.title: The Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2016 provides a boost to talented young entrepreneurs
item.description:
Source: GES 2016. President Obama waves as he walks off the stage with Mark Zuckerberg, Chairman, CEO, and co-founder of Facebook with successful young entrepreneurs from Africa and South America after a panel discussion that he moderated. This is the occasion where he famously said he still had some time to go before he could wear a t-shirt like Zuckerberg, but could at least remove his jacket. item.title: A white paper by the Dubai Chamber examines the funding landscape for startups in Dubai
item.description:
Source: Dubai Chamber. Cover for the white paper. A recent report highlights the need for a simplified guide to help UAE startups navigate the funding landscape and connect with eager investors. The Dubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry, in partnership with Roland Berger, published this white paper, titled “Helping Startups Access Funding,” during the March edition of Dubai Startup Hub’s Entrepreneurship Advocacy Series. item.title: Singapore ranked among the top five in the 2016 WE Cities Index
item.description:
Dell has identified the top 25 cities worldwide that cultivate high-potential women entrepreneurs (HPWE) for 2016 through their Women Entrepreneur Cities Index (WE Cities). This unique index assesses a city’s capacity to attract and promote the growth of women-led businesses. The study focused on cities rather than countries to highlight how local policies and initiatives impact women entrepreneurs, in addition to national legislation and norms. The WE Cities findings will serve as a starting point for discussions at the seventh annual Dell Women’s Entrepreneur Network Summit (DWEN)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singapore-ranked-among-the-top-five-in-the-2016-we-cities-index/

item.title: The fourth bootcamp for 1Malaysia Entrepreneurs has begun
item.description:
Source: 1MET. Over 500 participants attended the 1MET bootcamps in Kota Kinabalu. The 1Malaysia Entrepreneur (1MET) program, an initiative of the National Entrepreneurship Development Office (NEDO) within the Malaysian Ministry of Finance, has initiated its fourth round of two-day entrepreneurial bootcamps. Utilizing an experiential model, these bootcamps offer a six-month mentoring and coaching opportunity for 500 chosen business concepts. The first group to benefit from this follow-up program commenced in August 2016...

item.title: Work together at a beach resort and form new relationships
item.description:
While new coworking spaces and startup events are constantly emerging, forging meaningful connections with startups outside of one’s immediate location can still be challenging. Coworking Camp aims to bridge this gap with its upcoming six-week program. This program offers startups and digital nomads a chance to network and explore business opportunities with like-minded individuals in a relaxed and comfortable environment. Source: Coworking Camp website. Matthias Zeitler, Chief Coworker, highlights the program’s focus on fostering valuable connections and providing a space for rejuvenation...

item.title: AsiaKredit has introduced a consumer lending platform in the Philippines
item.description:
AsiaKredit’s goal is to make financial services more accessible in the Philippines. They aim to achieve this by making credit easier to obtain and improving the approval rates for individuals with limited or no credit history. Source: pera247 website. Screenshot of the pera247 app. Pera247 is a completely digital platform offering short-term loans, up to 90 days, through a mobile wallet. These loans are typically small, unsecured, and target consumers with limited financial history...

item.title: Fikra Labs aims to speed up innovation in the travel and tourism industry
item.description:
In February, during UAE Innovation Month, which promotes the country’s global innovation hub status and recognizes innovators, four Abu Dhabi groups are collaborating with Wamda, an entrepreneurship platform, to launch the Fikra Labs acceleration program. The partners, including the Department of Culture and Tourism – Abu Dhabi, Miral Asset Management, Etihad Aviation Group, and Abu Dhabi National Exhibitions Company (ADNEC), with support from Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), aim to boost innovation and entrepreneurship in Abu Dhabi’s travel and tourism industry...

item.title: Kickstarter's main focus is the fast Phone Finder
item.description:
The Phone Finder helps locate lost smartphones, even if they’re on silent mode, for up to three years. When the Phone Finder device is clicked within 15 meters of the missing phone, the phone will ring, vibrate, and flash, making it easier to find. If the phone is out of range, the Phone Finder website displays its location on a map. Source: Kickstarter Creator Gabsow Tom selected Bluetooth 2.1 for its forward and backward compatibility, allowing the Phone Finder to work with any smartphone, regardless of its iOS or Android version...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/kickstarter-s-main-focus-is-the-fast-phone-finder/

item.title: AppShack is a reality show that connects investors with startups
item.description:
Source: AppShack. The official launch was officiated by Bhg. Dato’ Jailani Johari, Deputy Minister of Communications and Multimedia Malaysia. AppShack, a Malaysian company that connects startups with organizations seeking mobile application innovation, has officially launched. This platform supports startups in developing their ideas by providing mentorship, technical expertise, business structure assistance, legal advice, and financial funding opportunities. Successful applicants can connect with investors and partners, including consortiums, venture capitalists, and bankers...

item.title: Alibaba Cloud introduces the Create@Alibaba Cloud startup program
item.description:
Alibaba Cloud, the cloud computing branch of Alibaba Group, has launched its first international startup program, Create@Alibaba Cloud. The program was announced in Singapore, home to Alibaba Cloud’s international headquarters, which will also serve as the regional hub for the initiative. Singapore was selected as the regional hub due to its strong ties and access to other ASEAN markets, such as Thailand, Indonesia, and Malaysia. The company explained that Singapore’s robust connectivity and reputation as Asia’s most entrepreneurial economy enable participating startups to easily connect within Singapore and expand into neighboring markets...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/alibaba-cloud-introduces-the-create-alibaba-cloud-startup-program/

item.title: Female entrepreneurs need more than just determination to succeed, according to Mastercard
item.description:
The first Mastercard Index of Women Entrepreneurs reveals that strong support systems, such as easy access to financial services and a business-friendly environment, are crucial for women-owned businesses to succeed. These enabling factors are essential in overcoming the two biggest hurdles women face in entrepreneurship: cultural bias and limited opportunities for advancement. Developed economies lead the index, with New Zealand (74.4), Canada (72.4), and the US (69.9) claiming the top spots...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/female-entrepreneurs-need-more-than-just-determination-to-succeed-according-to-mastercard/

item.title: Members of Impact Hub have access to resources provided by Google for Entrepreneurs
item.description:
Source: Impact Hub. Horowitz (left) with Sai (right). Impact Hub, the largest coworking and entrepreneur-building community in Singapore, has partnered with Google for Entrepreneurs as its first tech hub partner in Southeast Asia. This collaboration grants Impact Hub Singapore members access to Google for Entrepreneurs’ global network and resources, encompassing numerous coworking spaces and community programs across 135 countries. Impact Hub Singapore is dedicated to fostering startup growth by offering comprehensive support, ranging from coworking space to essential resources and tools...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/members-of-impact-hub-have-access-to-resources-provided-by-google-for-entrepreneurs/

item.title: Men's cufflinks that can be customized are now offered on Indiegogo
item.description:
CuffloCs, customizable cufflinks designed for men, are seeking funding on Indiegogo. These unique cufflinks feature a secure compartment for holding small items. According to creator Josh Jablonski, CuffloCs can accommodate a variety of small objects, such as jewelry charms, pebbles, or even photographs. Source: Indiegogo. “The screw/on off design ensures the security of your items within the double-sided glass, and the cufflink can be effortlessly disassembled to switch up the design,” explains Jablonski on his Indiegogo page...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/men-s-cufflinks-that-can-be-customized-are-now-offered-on-indiegogo/

item.title: GoDaddy is dedicated to creating impressive and impactful business identities for small businesses
item.description:
GoDaddy: Expanding Beyond Domains to Empower Small Businesses While GoDaddy is known for domain names, it has evolved into much more. CEO Blake Irving emphasizes the company’s focus on supporting small businesses, a demographic often overlooked despite representing a significant portion of most economies. Irving highlights that small businesses, even those with a single employee, present a vast untapped market. Traditional solutions often cater to either large enterprises or individual consumers, leaving small businesses underserved...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/godaddy-is-dedicated-to-creating-impressive-and-impactful-business-identities-for-small-businesses/

item.title: Singapore has revealed a budget for 2016 that is favorable to small and medium-sized enterprises
item.description:
Source: Budget in Brief document on Singapore Budget website. Singapore’s Finance Minister, Heng Swee Keat, introduced a new program to bolster businesses and industries while stimulating growth through innovation. Building on the Quality Growth Programme from Budget 2013, this initiative, called the Industry Transformation Programme (ITP), seeks to foster innovation and productivity. The goal is to empower Singaporean companies to become more resilient and capitalize on the anticipated global economic upswing...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singapore-has-revealed-a-budget-for-2016-that-is-favorable-to-small-and-medium-sized-enterprises/

item.title: Kickstarter's main focus is the standing desk
item.description:
If you need a desk that allows you to work comfortably while standing, Steven Yu might have a solution. His StandDesk is height-adjustable, ranging from 71cm to 114cm, and incorporates design elements that make frequent adjustments easy. Source: Kickstarter. The all-black StandDesk version. “The StandDesk is more than a product; it’s a positive step towards improving people’s lives globally,” Yu stated on his Kickstarter page. An intuitive ‘up/down’ control button effortlessly raises or lowers the desk to the desired height...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/kickstarter-s-main-focus-is-the-standing-desk/

item.title: CrowdsUnite offers convenient crowdsourcing updates all in one location
item.description:
CrowdsUnite (crowdsunite.com) aims to be the “Yelp” for crowdfunding, featuring over 800 platforms in its database. The website provides guidance on crowdfunding and helps startups find the best platforms for their needs. Alex Feldman, CEO of CrowdsUnite, points out that crowdfunding sites vary in features, customer support, and transparency. He emphasizes the risk of fraudulent campaigns that disappear with investors’ money. Source: CrowdsUnite blog. Feldman presents crowdfunding at a July 2014 talk in New York, US...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/crowdsunite-offers-convenient-crowdsourcing-updates-all-in-one-location/

item.title: The main focus of Kickstarter is iFind, which is powered by ambient electromagnetic radiation
item.description:
WeTag’s iFind tags use Bluetooth to connect with iOS or Android devices and don’t require charging. Like similar tracking devices, the tag is attached to an item and located using a smartphone. If the item goes out of range, the ‘Rope’ feature notifies the owner. The ‘UHelp’ feature leverages nearby phones to help find the lost object through Bluetooth. WeTag highlights a unique feature: shaking the iFind tag will cause the paired phone to vibrate...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-main-focus-of-kickstarter-is-ifind-which-is-powered-by-ambient-electromagnetic-radiation/

item.title: The Great Women Connect Series begins with Great Women Malaysia
item.description:
Source: Great Women Malaysia. Puan Nadira Yusoff. The Great Women Connect Series debuted today in Malaysia. This new program seeks to provide a space for women in business worldwide to connect and exchange ideas and experiences related to trade. It also aims to foster international partnerships, helping women, especially those in Malaysia, build networks and realize their full potential. Great Women Malaysia (GMW) is an initiative that strives to empower Malaysian women, particularly those in underserved and rural areas...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-great-women-connect-series-begins-with-great-women-malaysia/

item.title: Crowdonomic is now a registered e-facility for equity crowdfunding in Malaysia
item.description:
Source: Crowdonomic. Crowdonomic was one of just a few operators approved as a Registered Electronic Facility (Equity Crowdfunding Platform) by Malaysia’s Securities Commission. From left: Nicola Castelnuovo, Co-founder and Chief Commercial Officer of Crowdonomic; Datuk Ranjit Ajit Singh, Chairman, Securities Commission Malaysia and Leo Shimada, Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Crowdonomic. Crowdonomic, a leading crowdfunding platform in Southeast Asia, was designated as a registered electronic facility by the Securities Commission Malaysia (SC)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/crowdonomic-is-now-a-registered-e-facility-for-equity-crowdfunding-in-malaysia/
